pages.text: Walk through this block to travel to $(l:gaim/dimensions/helheim)Helheim$(/l)$(br2)Spawn locations: Bamboo Jungle, Birch Forest, Dark Forest, Flower Forest, Forest, Grove, Jungle, Mangrove Swamp, Old Growth Birch Forest, Plains, Sparse Jungle, Sunflower Plains, Swamp, $(l:gaim/dimensions/helheim)Helheim$(/l)$(br2)Can be opened manually with a $(l:gaim/arsenal/sid_lockseed)Sid Lockseed$(/l)
